column4: anyone have any idea on how to deal with the lack of sound in firefox?
flash issue?
did you try to install libflashsupport?
you have sound in rythmbox?
so there is no sound at all?
Do you have ubuntu-restricted-extras installed?
try and install it
not sure it will fix it though
keep that package in mind though, you might wanna want to install it later
if that doesnt help , you might get some good reading there : http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=5587712#post5587712
any progress yet?
so it's a more complicated issue...
did you see that link?
might be a problem with proprietary formats
in that case ubuntu-restricted-extras should fixed it though...
ok so you want to make sure you can read mp3 formats and stuff...there are forums about it :)
yeah make sure you restart stuff...rebooting might an option too
you got it to work now?
:/ dont give up.
You basically need to make sure you have all the packages you need and that those packages do not step on each other or are broken (might want to reinstall a few of them to check)
